name: Blessing of Thanatos
description:
With the rise of a new tyrant Demi-God on the distant Agathi lands of the Underworld, the beginning of a new era was marked. This tyrant Demi-God subjugated the minds of the fallen mortals, subjecting them to endless pain and misery, the likes of which the underworld had never seen. The Demonic warlords and the God of the underworld, Hades, turned a blind eye to this but there was a whisper of a rumour that the grim Reaper, Thanatos, himself had taken upon himself to free the souls of these mortals
